sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivityService } from '../../Services/activity.service'; import { Project } from 'src/app/projects/Models/project'; @Component({ selector: 'app-project-activities', templateUrl: './project-activities.component.html', styleUrls: ['./project-activities.component.css'] }) export class ProjectActivitiesComponent implements OnInit{ projectId:number=0; constructor(private service:ActivityService){} projects:Project[]=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getAllProjects().subscribe((res)=>{ this.projects=res; console.log(res); }) } getActivitiesOfSelectedProject(projectId:any){ this.projectId=projectId.target; console.log("hi"+projectId); } }
